text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-PS74 is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-PS74 is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-PS74!

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-PS74. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

The ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4 RAM, 512 GB PCIe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL704GW-PS74 does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
